PiXograms
v0.2.1

Usage

As a class

<i class="pix pix-name"></i>

As a ligature

<i class="pix">name</i>
download icons download webfont

Testing Area

Type icon names and they'll appear as ligatures, joined as a single glyph:

qr

PiXograms is an open source project under an Artistic License 2.0.

Designed and developed at e[ad] Escuela de Arquitectura y Dise√±o PUCV, Chile. Special thanks to grunt-webfont.

This webfont is used along with PiX, an interaction notation language.
